description:
Married couples

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
According to the microcensus, married couples comprise only
married cohabiting persons. If a spouse is temporarily or
permanently away from the surveyed household at the time of
the survey, and if the interviewed spouse does not provide
any information on the absent spouse, the spouses are
regarded as married but separated.
